Defiled Amalgamation

"The skies echo a threatening call..." - When smashing the third [link Defiled Fissure]
{statblock { header:Defiled Amalgamation, items:[ {image: Images/DefiledAmalg} ] }, { header:Statistics, items:[ { label:Environment, value:[link Defiled Wastelands] }, { label:AI Type, value:Custom }, { label:Damage, values:[ 36 (contact), 39 (projectile) ] }, { label:Max Life, value:2400 }, { label:Defense, value:16 }, { label:KB Resist, value:60% }, { label:Immune to, values:[ [link Confused|$default|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Confused] [link Rasterized] [link Toxic Shock] ] } ] }, { header:Drops, items:[ { label:Coins, value:5 Gold }, { label:Items values:[ [link Lost Ore] (140-330) - 100%, [link Undead Chunks] (40-100) - 100%, [link Fiend Staff] - 33%, [link Return To Sender] - 33%, [link Ever-Watchful Eye] - 5%, [link Defiled Amalgamation Trophy] - 10%, [link Defiled Amalgamation Mask] - 14.29%, [link Lesser Healing Potion|$default|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Lesser_Healing_Potion] (5-15) - 100%, [link Treasure Bag (Defiled Amalgamation) | $default | Treasure_Bags#Defiled_Amalgamation | in Expert Mode] - 100%, [link Darker Instinct | Images/Darker_Instinct.png | $default | in [link Master Mode|$default|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Master_Mode]] - 100%, [link Defiled Amalgamation Relic | $default | Relics#Defiled_Amalgamation | in [link Master Mode|$default|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Master_Mode]] - 100% ] } ] } statblock} The Defiled Amalgamation is a pre-Hardmode boss that resides in the [link Defiled Wastelands]. It can be summoned when the player is on the surface of the world after destroying 3 [link Defiled Fissures] or when the player uses a [link Nerve Impulse Manipulator] anywhere in the Wastelands.
It resembles a bird-like, faintly-humanoid appearance while having two large fang-like appendages on both of its sides. These appendages reduce incoming damage by 65% when attacked from them (80% in Expert, and 100% in Master). The Defiled Amalgamation has multiple behaviors during its encounter. It dashes at the player, summons spikes, and can regenerate health. These behaviors can be explained in greater detail below. The Defiled Amalgamation is the only source of the [link Undead Chunk] material and is additionally a method to obtaining usable amounts of [link Lost Ore]. Furthermore, defeating the Amalgamation allows the Tavernkeep to spawn. <<<<<<< Updated upstream
Behavior

Approach

When the Amalgamation approaches the player, it will use its appendages to protect itself as it slowly descends to the ground whilst following the player's horizontal position. When close enough, it will drop and prepare to attack the player.

Attacks

  • Dash Attack - The Amalgamation will attempt to hit the player with a fast dash. It will charge at the player with its appendages swaying to its movement.
  • Uplift Attack - The Defiled Amalgamation will charge an attack where it balls up then proceeds to lift its appendages up, summoning Defiled spikes that expand upward below the player. It will only perform this attack when the player is near solid ground.
  • Knockout Attack - The Amalgamation's final attack is a triple-dash attack strike, but when it finishes the strike it will rest in place unable to move for 9 seconds (6 seconds in Expert, and 3 seconds in Master).

Special

The Amalgamation additionally has an active regeneration consistent with other Defiled [link Enemies] with a few key differences: the Defiled Amalgamation cannot regenerate above 80% health AND its regeneration rate is flat. Flat
regeneration basically means that its regeneration rate does not accelerate from recieved damage.

Difficulty Changes

Expert

- In Expert, the Defiled Amalgamation will have 60% more health raising it up from 2400 to 3840.
- The Amalgamation will attack more frequently as its health drops.
- The Amalgamation's attacks have a 50% chance of inflicting '[link Rasterized]' which will last up to 5 seconds, and still allow the player to attack.
- The appendages on the Amalgamation will reduce incoming damage by 80%.
- The Defiled Amalgamation will only rejuvenate for 6 seconds after performing a Knockout attack instead of 9.

Master

- All Expert changes apply.
- In Master mode, the Defiled Amalgamation gets an additional 60% increase in health raising it to 6144.
- The duration of the inflicted '[link Rasterized]' debuff lasts 8 seconds instead.
- The appendages instead block all incoming damage.
- The Defiled Amalgamation will only rejuvenate for 3 seconds after performing a Knockout attack instead of 9.
- Knockout attacks are more frequent.

=======
Behavior

Approach

When the Amalgamation approaches the player, it will use its appendages to protect itself as it slowly descends to the ground whilst following the player's horizontal position. When close enough, it will drop and prepare to attack the player.

Attacks

  • Dash Attack - The Amalgamation will attempt to hit the player with a fast dash. It will charge at the player with its appendages swaying to its movement.
  • Uplift Attack - The Defiled Amalgamation will charge an attack where it balls up then proceeds to lift its appendages up, summoning Defiled spikes that expand upward below the player. It will only perform this attack when the player is near solid ground.
  • Knockout Attack - The Amalgamation's final attack is a triple-dash attack strike, but when it finishes the strike it will rest in place unable to move for 9 seconds (6 seconds in Expert, and 3 seconds in Master).

Special

The Amalgamation additionally has an active regeneration consistent with other Defiled [link Enemies] with a few key differences: the Defiled Amalgamation cannot regenerate above 80% health AND its regeneration rate is flat. Flat
regeneration basically means that its regeneration rate does not accelerate from recieved damage.

Difficulty Changes

Expert

- In Expert, the Defiled Amalgamation will have 60% more health raising it up from 2400 to 3840.
- The Amalgamation will attack more frequently as its health drops.
- The Amalgamation's attacks have a 50% chance of inflicting '[link Rasterized]' which will last up to 5 seconds, and still allow the player to attack.
- The appendages on the Amalgamation will reduce incoming damage by 80%.
- The Defiled Amalgamation will only rejuvenate for 6 seconds after performing a Knockout attack instead of 9.

Master

- All Expert changes apply.
- In Master mode, the Defiled Amalgamation gets an additional 60% increase in health raising it to 6144.
- The duration of the inflicted '[link Rasterized]' debuff lasts 8 seconds instead.
- The appendages instead block all incoming damage.
- The Defiled Amalgamation will only rejuvenate for 3 seconds after performing a Knockout attack instead of 9.
- Knockout attacks are more frequent.

>>>>>>> Stashed changes
Notes

- The Defiled Amalgamation will pursue the player even outside of the Wastelands.
- In Expert, the Defiled Amalgamation will become enraged and attack even more frequently.

Tips

- The Defiled Amalgamation will not spawn after smashing 3 [link Defiled Fissures] if the player reloads the world.
- Explosives can deal their full damage to the Amalgamation even when attacking the appendages due to splash damage.
- When considering fighting the Defiled Amalgamation, plan ahead and build a proper arena to be above or below it often with platforms laid out in
multiple vertical layers. Be sure to be fast when it rejuvenates from a Knockout attack to deal optimal damage.

<<<<<<< Updated upstream
Trivia

- Unlike the rest of the world-evils, the Defiled Amalgamation does not have a Hardmode, mechanical equivalent similar to the Brain of Cthulhu.
- Due to its long name, the Defiled Amalgamation is often abbreviated as "DA".

=======
Trivia

- Unlike the rest of the world-evils, the Defiled Amalgamation does not have a Hardmode, mechanical equivalent similar to the Brain of Cthulhu.
- Due to its long name, the Defiled Amalgamation is often abbreviated as "DA".

>>>>>>> Stashed changes
Lore

The Defiled Amalgamation

The Defiled Amalgamation, like all creatures in the Wastelands, was once an ordinary living organism in the world until it was cursed by the Defiled.
The creature that was once the Amalgamation started to go about tasks in the [link Defiled Wastelands] in order to preserve its habitat until it grew to a
much larger size by collecting more chunks overtime and by even absorbing other Defiled beings. The Amalgamation eventually struggled to get any larger as
its rate of decay became more substantial and resorted to maintaining its size by actively hunting anything that comes into its territory. It marks its
territory around the openings of the caverns in the Wastelands and seems to protect the [link Defiled Fissures] as if they were its own. Despite its
uniqueness, it too is merely a proxy of the Defiled.
